Posts.Content: This has been a big worry of mine, im single, 37 and just had single mastectomy and nipple removed. how the hell is any1 guna want to have a relationship with me looking like i do!!
Posts.Title: How do you start a new relationship with no boobs??

Posts.Content: 2 wks post op and im not dealing with how my body looks very well. had left mastectomy and lost nipple. cant look at myself Zo
Posts.Title: Home from op
